name: Vishwas Mishra
college: Madan Mohan Malaviya University of Technology

education.school: Madan Mohan Malaviya University of Technology

projects.name: Ice-breaker
projects.description: Utilized Langchain, OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo and Tavily Search to create a tool that searches for individuals on LinkedIn based on their name and retrieves detailed information about them. Designed an intuitive user interface using Streamlit allowing users to input a name and receive comprehensive LinkedIn information including summaries and interesting facts within 5 seconds. Leveraged LLMChain and custom prompt templates to create concise summaries and unique facts from LinkedIn data achieving a 95% accuracy rate in information extraction and presentation.

projects.name: Skin-Disease Predictor
projects.description: Collected and preprocessed over 12000 images using Image Downloader Chrome extension and trained a ResNet-15v2 model achieving 97% accuracy. Built the backend with FastAPI achieving response times under 200ms and developed the frontend with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React resulting in a user-friendly interface. Conducted over 50 tests using Postman to verify API endpoints and ensure application performance and reliability.

projects.name: LexiPrompt
projects.description: Fine-tuned a GPT-2 model using LoRA adapters achieving an exceptional perplexity score of 1.82(indicative of high model accuracy). Used Python and Pytorch within the Hugging Face environment for model training and optimizations. Integrated the ML model into a web application using Flask showcasing its text generation capabilities. Built the user interface with HTML, CSS and JavaScript to provide a seamless user experience. Configured and monitored model training through Weight & Biases (WandB) reducing operational complexities. Achieved consistent reduction in training loss over 7,000 steps enhancing training outcomes and boosting model reliability through effective logging and real-time performance metrics monitoring.

projects.name: Spam-Ham Predictor
projects.description: Innovated and applied a highly accurate Spam Ham Detector in Python leveraging Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib and Seaborn achieving 95% precision and reduced false positives by 40% for enhanced data analysis and visualization. Employed advanced NLP techniques (NLTK, re, stopwords, Porter Stemmer and WordNet Lemmatizer) for effective data cleaning and text normalization. Leveraged TFIDF-Vectorizer to convert text data into a numerical format. Deployed an XGBoost Classifier to accurately classify and predict spam/ham messages. Visualized model performance through metrics like ROC, Accuracy, Recall and F2 score and used Streamlit to built an interactive application for showcasing the Spam Ham Detector's functionality.

experiences.description: Worked on Langchain and OpenAI function calling to execute projects like notes-generator, resume-parser, ChatBot, Document Chatter. Worked on models like Non-Cuboid, DETR, 3DETR, YOLO, Dectron2, Roomnet, Holistic3D, Mask2Former.

Executed YOLOv8-obb model to build an application which classifies organic and inorganic wastes and helps to separate them. Used Fatkun extension for batch downloading the images and then used roboflow to annote and train my YOLOv8-obb model. Integrated the machine learning model with an Android application using Firebase to facilitate real-time waste classification.

experiences.company_name: DataProSoftwareDevelopment and Research Centre Pvt Ltd
experiences.description: Developed an automated data cleaning process resulting in a 40% reduction in data errors and saving the team 10 hours per week. Conducted advanced data analysis using tools such as Matplotlib, Seaborn, numpy, PowerBI to derive actionable insights. Managed and refined monthly datasets by adding critical columns, enabling in-depth analysis for strategic decisions in optimizing advertisements placements and timing, maximizing earnings and enhancing student engagement through targeted educational tactics.
